overview:
Mr. Wilcoxson has fifteen years of venture capital and private equity investment experience. Prior to joining Axiom, Mr. Wilcoxson was a General Partner of Claflin Capital Management in Boston where he specialized in early-stage information technology companies.

Mr. Wilcoxson had also been an early member of Internet Capital Groupâ€™s investment team. He began his venture capital career with Massachusetts Technology Development Corporation. Mr. Wilcoxson spent three years with GE Capitalâ€™s Corporate Finance Group, where he focused on later-stage private equity investments in manufacturing, retail and communications companies. He began his career in General Electricâ€™s Financial Management Program.

Mr. Wilcoxson earned his undergraduate degree in Economics with honors from St. Lawrence University and Masters in Management from Northwestern Universityâ€™s Kellogg School of Management. Will currently serves as an Advisor to the Boards of airwide solutions and MX Logic. Mr. Wilcoxson previously served as a Board member or advisor to Albridge Solutions (sold to PNC Financial Services), Andover.net (IPO â€œANDNâ€, later sold to VA Linux), CenterPost Communications (sold to West Corporation), iFilm (sold to Viacom), Micro-E Systems (sold to GSI Lumonics), NexCen Technologies (sold to UCMS), Nufern (sold to Rofin Sinar Technologies), SilverStorm Technologies (sold to Q-Logic), Vibrint Technologies (sold to Grass Valley Technologies), VST Technologies (sold to SmartDisk), WellDog, Inc (sold to The Blue Sky Group).
